name: Asteroid Destroyer (Paco_Lol235)
description:
En este juego eres una nave del destrozado clan verde y buscas VENGANZA. Para ello te lanzas con una misión: Destruir el imperio rojo!

Hay tres modos de juego con diferentes características y varios power-ups que te ayudarán en tu partida. Pero hay una leyenda... un power-up dorado, con muy poca probabilidad de aparecer que te da vida infinita!

In this game you are a spaceship of the shattered green clan and you are looking for REVENGE. To do this, you set out on a mission: Destroy the red empire! There are three game modes with different characteristics and various power-ups to help you in your game. But there is a legend ... a golden power-up, with very little chance of appearing that will give you infinite life!
